resources.string: The current price of the crypto multiplied by its current circulating supply
The number of cryptos that are currently liquid and in circulation.
The maximum number of cryptos that will ever be issued.
The all-time-high/low trading price in selected currency.
The high/low trading price 24 hours in the selected currency.

In the rapidly evolving world of cryptocurrency, staying informed is key. The Crypto Glossary serves as a comprehensive guide, deciphering complex jargon and technical terms for both newcomers and seasoned enthusiasts alike. From "blockchain" and "mining" to "wallets" and "smart contracts", delve into clear definitions and explanations, ensuring you navigate the crypto sphere with confidence and clarity.
